flawed_nl_solution:
On Wednesday she pulled 25*3=<<25*3=75>>75 weeds
On Thursday she pulled 75/5=<<75/5=51>>51 weeds
On Friday she pulled 51-10=<<51-10=41>>41 weeds
In total she pulled 25+75+51+41=<<25+75+51+41=192>>192 weeds

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15.0, not 51.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
